title: Sidewall, "The Montesian Design", 1875–1900
creditline: Gift of Arlene M. and Thomas C. Ellis
description: Neo-classic design with beaded festoons, urns, birds, peacocks, squirrels, garlands, acanthus and bowknots. Printed in white on dusty pink ground paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, "The Montesian Design", 1875–1900.
1875–1900. Block-printed. Gift of Arlene M. and Thomas C. Ellis. 1981-65-21.
